thread.title: Tech Advisors names Connor MacLean Tech Support Engineer
thread.title_full: Tech Advisors names Connor MacLean Tech Support Engineer

author: prbuzz.com
title: Tech Advisors names Connor MacLean Tech Support Engineer
text:
~~CONTACT: Jim Farrell, PR First, 781-681-6616,
Tech Advisors names Connor MacLean as Tech Support Engineer
BOSTON and MEDFIELD, MA, ISSUED SEPTEMBER 15, 2015…Tech Advisors (www.tech-adv.com), a leading technology solution provider for small to mid-sized businesses, announces that Connor MacLean of Allston, Massachusetts has joined the firm as a Tech Support Help Desk Engineer.
In this role, MacLean is responsible for assisting clients with technical support questions as well as troubleshooting, through remote login, support for servers, workstations, tablets, phones and client software issues.
Prior to Tech Advisors, MacLean worked at Tufts University as a Systems Engineer in the IT Department.
He is a graduate of Wentworth Institute of Technology with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Networking and System Administration.
Originally from Lenox, Massachusetts, MacLean now lives in Allston. He is the son of Rob and Heidi MacLean who he credits for “helping me get where I am today.”
“We welcome Connor to Tech Advisors,” said company principal Konrad Martin. “His aptitude, attention to detail and commitment to providing outstanding client service is certain to make him a valuable member of our fine professional team.”
About Tech Advisors
Since 2002, Tech Advisors (www.tech-adv.com) has answered the technology needs of Greater Boston and beyond. A complete technology solution provider, Tech Advisors (formerly known as techKnowledge Advisors) is 100% committed to seeing that business owners have the most reliable, professional IT service. The firm, a family business, specializes in providing IT solutions to growing Massachusetts businesses across a wide range of industries. Tech Advisors offers a full range of services for businesses including an all-inclusive monthly price, Cloud Services, onsite management, project work, Compliance reports , 24 hour 365 day Help Desk Support, data backup and recovery, e-mail/spam protection, and more. The firm is a 2015 recipient of the Boston Business Journal Pacesetters award, placing the company in the top 70 of the region’s fastest growing businesses .Tech Advisors maintains offices at 20 Park Plaza, Boston, MA and 266 Main Street, Suite 15, Medfield, MA. For additional information please email or call (508) 359-4028.
